snippet: Shaun White is possibly the best-known member of the United States Olympic team. When he drops into the halfpipe, he does it at full speed – an aggressiveness that distinguishes him.

byline.original: By BEDEL SAGET, GRAHAM ROBERTS and CATHERINE SPANGLER

lead_paragraph: Shaun White is possibly the best-known member of the United States Olympic team. When he drops into the halfpipe, he does it at full speed – an aggressiveness that distinguishes him.
